pages.text: The $(thing)Zorra$() is an artificial breed of tree obtained by putting any sapling through the $(item)Atomic Reshaper$(). Its leaves are razor sharp and can be harvested to make $(item)Zorrasteel$().$(br2)While $(item)Zorra Saplings$() are expensive and the trees don't yield a lot of them, any $(item)Zorra Leaves$() grown from a sapling can absorb the blood of any creature it kills and use it to spread a few blocks.
$(item)Raw Zorrasteel Ingots$() then need to be processed in the $(item)Explosion Furnace$() to become useable $(item)Zorrasteel Ingots$().
